blood.label: blood
blood.description: Blood represents how much your hunger for blood is sated.

health.label: health
health.description: Health represents your current physical condition and stamina.

spirit.label: spirit
spirit.description: Spirit is your current morale and mental state.

lasting_effects.label: lasting effects
lasting_effects.description: Lasting effects are permanent. They forever impact your character through the momentum adjustment and—more importantly—the narrative impact of being permanently harmed or traumatized. You should factor this impact into how you perform moves and how you interact with the world.

permanently_harmed.label: permanently harmed
permanently_harmed.description: Permanently harmed may be marked when you are at 0 health and fail to [Endure Harm](datasworn:move:starforged/suffer/endure_harm). You have suffered a wound that you must reckon with, such as the loss of an eye or hand. Or you bear physical scars that are a constant reminder of a harrowing incident.

traumatized.label: traumatized
traumatized.description: Traumatized may be marked when you are at 0 spirit and fail to [Endure Stress](datasworn:move:starforged/suffer/endure_stress). Your experiences have left you emotionally or mentally scarred.

sinner.label: sinner
sinner.description: Sinner may be marked when you are Starving, at 0 blood and spend blood. You get so frenzied, you commit something that angers your ruler. Envision what it is and what she asks of you in exchange for letting you live. When this impact is marked, you have 0 blood and you spend more blood, you lose complete touch with your human side and turn into a beast.

misfortunes.label: misfortunes
misfortunes.description: Misfortunes are temporary. They last until your character has adequate opportunity, resources, and time to recover.

wounded.label: wounded
wounded.description: Wounded may be marked when you are at 0 health and fail to [Endure Harm](datasworn:move:starforged/suffer/endure_harm). You are severely injured.

shaken.label: shaken
shaken.description: Shaken may be marked when you are at 0 spirit and fail to [Endure Stress](datasworn:move:starforged/suffer/endure_stress). You are despairing or distraught.

starving.label: starving
starving.description: Starving is marked when you are at 0 blood and lose blood. You are in a violent, hungry state. You lose 1 point of glamour and 1 of intellect.

elegies.label: elegies
elegies.description: Sing elegies and do what you must to see them fulfilled.

action.name: Action
action.summary: Use this table to inspire a discovery, event, character goal, or situation. A roll on this table can be combined with a [Theme](datasworn:oracle_rollable:classic/action_and_theme/theme) to provide an action and a subject. Then, interpret the result based on the context of the question and your current situation.

descriptors.name: Descriptor Table
descriptors.summary: Use this oracle to determine a random descriptive word or adjective for a scenario.

themes.name: Theme Table
themes.summary: Use this oracle to determine a random theme or motif for a story or scenario.

complications.summary: Use this oracle to determine story complications.

Enemy reveals their true agenda or nature

Urgent message distracts you from your mission
You were diverted from the true crisis
A hidden treasure or artifact is discovered
